column1: '''Patrick Howard Wynne''' is one of the leading figures in the [[Elvish Linguistic Fellowship]]
column2: and was co-editor of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'' (along with [[Carl F. Hostetter]]
column4: [[Arden R. Smith]] and [[Bill Welden]]). He has published numerous articles relating to the invented languages of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]
column5: and he is a quite prolific illustrator.<ref>[[SEVEN 17|''SEVEN: An Anglo-American Literary Review''
column7: "Concerning the Contributors"</ref> He also frequents the [[Lambengolmor (mailing list)|Lambengolmor mailing list]].
